dialog.comingSoon.title: Coming Soon
dialog.comingSoon.desc.saveTemplate: Template feature is coming soon: save current task params as a reusable template to quickly apply on create page.
dialog.comingSoon.desc.duplicate: Duplicate feature is coming soon: it will create a new task with current params so you can tweak and submit.
dialog.comingSoon.desc.applyTemplate: Apply from Template is coming soon: you will be able to select a template to auto-fill the form. You can also visit Templates to browse.
